data.title: The Black Crowes
data.meta_description: The Black Crowes announced, ‘Happiness Bastards Tour (The Reprise)’ – is headed to Fantasy Springs Resort Casino on Friday, Dec. 6.
data.text:
PURCHASE TICKETSFAQ

*Must be or become a Rewards Club member and present a valid government issued id to redeem offer at Rewards Club desk. Must be 21 or older. Limit one (1) $10 Free Slot Play offer per person and valid on date of concert only. See Rewards Club for details. Management reserves the right to modify or cancel promotion at any time.

If you need assistance with purchasing accessible seats, please contact the box office at 760-342-5000.

Click to Access Your Mobile Tickets
